articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Sri Lanka air force plane crashes. killing all 4 aboard
articles.description: A Sri Lankan air force plane has crashed, killing all four crew members on board
articles.content:
COLOMBO, Sri Lanka -- 
A Sri Lankan air force plane crashed on Friday, killing all four crew members on board, an air force spokesman said.
The crash occurred in Haputale district in the island's mountain regions, about 200 kilometers (124 miles) east of th… [+270 chars]

articles.description: Iran's supreme leader warns 'a harsh retaliation is waiting' after US airstrike kills Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
Iran's supreme leader warns 'a harsh retaliation is waiting' after US airstrike kills Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani.

articles.title: Soleimani, a general who became Iran icon by targeting US
articles.description: For Iranians, Qassem Soleimani widely represented the most prominent figure outside its Shiite theocracy of national resilience in the face of four decades of U.S. pressure
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
For Iranians whose icons since the Islamic Revolution have been stern-faced clergy, Maj. Gen. Qassem Soleimani widely represented a figure of national resilience in the face of four decades of U.S. pressure.

articles.title: Report: Allegiant flight in emergency landing, no injuries
articles.description: An Allegiant Air spokeswoman says one of its flights bound from Ohio to Florida with 151 passengers and six crew made an emergency landing in North Carolina as a precaution after an indicator light went on in the cockpit
articles.content:
ASHEVILLE, NC -- 
An Allegiant Air flight bound from Ohio to Florida with 151 passengers and six crew made an emergency landing in North Carolina on Thursday afternoon, and there were no injuries, an airline spokeswoman said.
